Module Simulator
Package kin.sim.trid.renderobj

Class RenderObj

java.lang.Object
kin.sim.trid.renderobj.RenderObj
Direct Known Subclasses:
BottomGrid, Box, Line, Pixel, PlainPoly, Sphere
public abstract class RenderObj
extends java.lang.Object
An (abstract) object that can be rendered in 3D.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static int RENDER_PRIO_BOTTOM
    Rendering priority: bottom
    static int RENDER_PRIO_OBJECT
    Rendering priority: an object
    double viewDistance
    Average distance to the projection plane in viewing direction.
    double viewDistanceNearest
    Nearest distance to the projection plane in viewing direction.

    • is2Doutside

      public abstract boolean is2Doutside​(double fromX, double fromY, double toX, double toY)
      Generally check, if this object is to be painted on screen.
      Parameters:
      fromX - bounding rect to paint (from x)
      fromY - bounding rect to paint (from y)
      toX - bounding rect to paint (to x)
      toY - bounding rect to paint (to y)
      Returns:
      true if outside the rect

    • is2Doutside

      public boolean is2Doutside​(double fromX, double fromY, double toX, double toY, double[][] poly2D)
      Generally check, if a given polygon (2D) is to be painted on screen.
      Parameters:
      fromX - bounding rect to paint (from x)
      fromY - bounding rect to paint (from y)
      toX - bounding rect to paint (to x)
      toY - bounding rect to paint (to y)
      poly2D - the polygon (2D)
      Returns:
      true if outside the rect

    • addBottom

      public static void addBottom​(java.util.ArrayList<RenderObj> scene, Environment environment)
      Add bottom objects to a scene to render.
      Parameters:
      scene - list of renderable objects
      environment - the environment

    • addEnvironment

      public static void addEnvironment​(java.util.ArrayList<RenderObj> scene, Environment environment)
      Add all environment objects to a scene to render.
      Parameters:
      scene - list of renderable objects
      environment - the environment

    • recursivelyAddScene

      public static void recursivelyAddScene​(java.util.ArrayList<RenderObj> scene, Component component, java.awt.Color bodyColor)
      Recursively add this component and all attached components to a scene list for 3D rendering.
      Parameters:
      scene - the 3D scene to render
      component - component and its attached components to render
      bodyColor - body color

    • addPaintCommands

      public static void addPaintCommands​(java.util.ArrayList<RenderObj> scene, SimDebugPainterOverlay3D ov)
      Add all painting commands to a scene list for 3D rendering.
      Parameters:
      scene - list of renderable objects
      ov - debug painting overlay (3D) with point cloud
